text.div:
BC BreastCancerNCategoryCS CodeSystem

Codes that designate concepts describing Node category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BreastCancerNCategoryCS
title: BC BreastCancerNCategoryCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Codes that designate concepts describing Node category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol NX in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol NX in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.

concept.definition: The concept designated by the symbol N0 in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol N0 in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
